### Post-money valuation and ownership ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(121218) #| eval: true #| echo: false #| results: asis #| warning: false # Gerar valores aleatórios iinvest <- round(0.05 + runif(1, 0.001, 0.01), 3) ishares1 <- 1 ishares2 <- 0.75 ishares3 <- 2 ainvest <- 3 share_price <- ainvest / ishares3 # Cálculos post_money <- round((ishares1 + ishares2 + ishares3) * share_price, 3) vc_pct <- round(ishares3 / (ishares1 + ishares2 + ishares3) * 100, 3) your_pct <- round(ishares1 / (ishares1 + ishares2 + ishares3) * 100, 3) your_value <- round(ishares1 * share_price, 3) ``` ::: You founded your company with **0.058 million** and received **1 million shares**. You later sold **0.75 million shares** to angel investors. Now a VC wants to invest **3 million** in exchange for **2 million shares**. ::: {.question-block}
1. What is the post-money valuation (in million)?
✅ Post-money = (Total shares) × (Price per share) = (3.75) × (1.5) = **5.625 million**
::: ::: {.question-block}
2. What percentage of the firm will the VC own?
✅ VC Ownership = 2 / (3.75) × 100 = **53.333%**
::: ::: {.question-block}
3. What is the value of your shares (in million)?
✅ Value = 1 × 1.5 = **1.5 million**
:::
